rows.label: bf02270100_0010
rows.name: What's this then...?

rows.label: bf02270100_0020
rows.name:
Nobody ever see this before.
Secret of Tora!

rows.label: bf02270100_0030
rows.name: An artificial Blade!

rows.label: bf02270100_0040
rows.name: An artificial Blade?

rows.label: bf02270100_0050
rows.name: I can't believe it.

rows.label: bf02270100_0060
rows.name: Tora have always wanted to be Driver of Blade.

rows.label: bf02270100_0070
rows.name:
But Tora...
Tora has no potential to awaken Core Crystal.

rows.label: bf02270100_0080
rows.name:
How could you know that?
Surely you just have to try, and-

rows.label: bf02270100_0085
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]  Ohhh.

rows.label: bf02270100_0090
rows.name: You did, didn't you?

rows.label: bf02270100_0100
rows.name:
Yes, one year ago, Tora applied
to Driver recruitment man.

rows.label: bf02270100_0110
rows.name: Oh deary me.

rows.label: bf02270100_0120
rows.name: Tora-kun, you mean you...?

rows.label: bf02270100_0130
rows.name:
It was bad. Tora had nosebleed for
three days!

rows.label: bf02270100_0140
rows.name: Just a...nosebleed?

rows.label: bf02270100_0150
rows.name:
What you mean, "just"?!
People die from loss of blood, you know?!

rows.label: bf02270100_0160
rows.name: Yeah, but from a nosebleed?

rows.label: bf02270100_0170
rows.name: Anyway, moving on...!

rows.label: bf02270100_0180
rows.name:
For a near-death experience,
you're awfully casual about this...

rows.label: bf02270100_0190
rows.name: ANYWAY! Back to Tora's Blade.

rows.label: bf02270100_0200
rows.name:
When complete, even no-potential Tora
can be a Driver!

rows.label: bf02270100_0210
rows.name:
This is simply incredible. You built
this Blade from scratch, Tora?

rows.label: bf02270100_0220
rows.name: Hm, it was started by Grampypon and Dadapon.

rows.label: bf02270100_0230
rows.name:
But Grampypon die, and Tora still not
know where Dadapon go to...

rows.label: bf02270100_0240
rows.name: Oh...

rows.label: bf02270100_0250
rows.name:
So Tora will finish Blade myself and
become a Driver like always wanted!

rows.label: bf02270100_0260
rows.name:
Then Dadapon hear about Tora's
success and come back home, yes?

rows.label: bf02270100_0270
rows.name: Tora-kun...

rows.label: bf02270100_0280
rows.name: By the by, Tora, this Blade...

rows.label: bf02270100_0290
rows.name:
As far as I can see, it looks complete.
What is there left to do?

rows.label: bf02270100_0300
rows.name:
Mehehehe! All Tora have left to do
is buy missing parts!

rows.label: bf02270100_0310
rows.name: But Tora have no money at all!

rows.label: bf02270100_0320
rows.name: Oh? Really?

rows.label: bf02270100_0330
rows.name: Really.

rows.label: bf02270100_0340
rows.name: Nothing? At all?

rows.label: bf02270100_0350
rows.name: Not even one gold...

rows.label: bf02270100_0360
rows.name: So you're asking for a loan?

rows.label: bf02270100_0370
rows.name:
Uhh, not...loan, hehe. Um, closer to...
generous...donation!

rows.label: bf02270100_0380
rows.name:
Just like a Nopon. Always
shrewd when it comes to gold!

rows.label: bf02270100_0390
rows.name:
B-b-but if Tora completes artificial Blade,
combat capabilities will be big help on mission!

rows.label: bf02270100_0400
rows.name: Well, yeah, if it works you may have a point...

rows.label: bf02270100_0410
rows.name: So...how much exactly do you need?

rows.label: bf02270100_0420
rows.name: Oh...no more than 60,000 gold...?

rows.label: bf02270100_0430
rows.name:
Sixty thousand?!
Yeah... that's way too big a number.

rows.label: bf02270100_0440
rows.name: Hey, Rex. I think we owe Tora-kun our help.

rows.label: bf02270100_0450
rows.name:
If it's just money he needs,
I may be able to assist.

rows.label: bf02270100_0460
rows.name: Assist? How, exactly?

rows.label: bf02270100_0470
rows.name: Don't tell me you plan to sell your bod-

rows.label: bf02270100_0480
rows.name: Give it a break, you dirty old man.

rows.label: bf02270100_0490
rows.name:
This is a natural crystal.
It should fetch around 60,000.

rows.label: bf02270100_0500
rows.name: No way! We can't let you sell that!

rows.label: bf02270100_0510
rows.name: But-

rows.label: bf02270100_0520
rows.name:
Urgh, I'm a man! 
That's it, I'm paying for the parts myself!

rows.label: bf02270100_0530
rows.name: Very admirable.

rows.label: bf02270100_0540
rows.name:
Meh Meh!
Boss is man among men!

rows.label: bf02270100_0550
rows.name:
This Blade of yours had better be
seriously useful, though, Tora!

rows.label: bf02270100_0560
rows.name: Leave that to Tora!

rows.label: bf02270100_0570
rows.name: Well, then, let's go, I guess!

rows.label: bf02270100_0580
rows.name: Yippee!

rows.label: bf02270100_0590
rows.name: Will they really be okay?

rows.label: bf02270100_0600
rows.name: I suppose they'll have to be...
